Enter TODAY for a chance to WIN your share of R20 000 & nationwide fame!

Now we are giving YOU the chance to design a brand-new blanket AND have your blanket added to the homechoice range and sold nationwide.

A panel of experts will select the top three designs, and the public will get to vote for the WINNER!

Cash prizes and nationwide fame
The WINNING design will receive R10 000 in cash, their design featured on the winning blanket, the opportunity to name the blanket and a blanket featuring the winning design.

By signing up, you agree to receive electronic and other marketing through text, emails and other electronic channels from homechoice and FinChoice Africa about their retail, credit, insurance and other financial services products.
